summary: The document details a regulatory action against Richard Kahn for failing to provide requested testimony to FINRA on behalf of NYSE Arca. As a result, he is permanently barred from NYSE Arca membership unless he complies with the terms set forth in the decision.

persons.name: Richard Kahn
persons.context: Richard Kahn is mentioned as a respondent who violated NYSE Arca Equities Rule by failing to provide testimony as requested by FINRA.

events.title: Regulatory Action Against Richard Kahn
events.description: Richard Kahn was found to have violated NYSE Arca Equities Rule 1a2(d) by not providing requested testimony, resulting in a permanent bar from NYSE Arca membership unless he complies with the decision's terms.

keyFacts: Richard Kahn was permanently barred from NYSE Arca membership due to failure to provide testimony.
The decision was issued on April 20, 2012.
Kahn has 120 calendar days from the decision to provide the requested testimony to avoid the bar.
